422:1: iti hi bhikṣavo yāmeva rātriṃ bodhisattvo jātastasyāmeva rātryāṃ viṃśati kanyāsahasrāṇi kṣatriyabrāhmaṇanaigamagṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu jātāḥ|
422:3: viṃśati ca kanyāsahasrāṇi rājñā śuddhodanena dattāni bodhisattvasyopasthānaparicaryāyai|
422:6: tadā ca bhikṣavo mahallakamahallikāḥ śākyāḥ saṃnipatya rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ-yatkhalu deva jānīyāḥ-devakulaṃ kumāra upanīyatāmiti|
422:23: iti hi bhikṣavo yathoktapūrvaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtamabhūt||
422:24: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ svagṛhaṃ praviśya mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīmāmantryaivamāha-alaṃkriyantāṃ kumāraḥ devakulamupaneṣyata iti|
422:25: sādhviti pratiśrutya mahāprajāpatī gautamī kumāraṃ maṇḍayati sma ||
422:26: tataḥ kumāro maṇḍyamānaḥ prahasitavadano vyapagatabhṛkuṭikaḥ paramamadhurayā vācā mātṛsvasāramevamāha-amba kutrāhamupaneṣyata iti|
422:28: tataḥ kumāraḥ smitamupadarśayan prahasitavadano mātṛsvasāraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
422:33: katamo'nyu deva mama uttari yo viśiṣṭo
422:36: devo na me'sti sadṛśaḥ kuta uttaraṃ vā||2||
422:41: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ sarvairvarṇaiḥ stutimaṅgalaiḥ pratyupasthitairaparimitālaṃkārālaṃkṛteṣu vīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakāntarāpaṇamukheṣvantaḥpure kumārasya rathamalaṃkṛtya rājā śuddhodano brāhmaṇanaigamaśreṣṭhigṛhapatyamātyakoṭṭarājadauvārikapāriṣadyamitrajñātiparivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dhūpanadhūpitena muktapuṣpābhikīrṇena hayagajarathapattikalilenocchritachatradhvajapatākena nānātūryasaṃpravāditena mārgeṇa kumāraṃ gṛhītvā gacchati sma|
422:43: anekāni ca devaputrāpsaraḥkoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi gaganatalagatāni puṣpavarṣāṇyabhipravarṣanti sma|
422:45: iti hi rājā śuddhodano mahatā rājavyūhena mahatā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena kumāraṃ gṛhītvā devakulaṃ praviśati sma|
422:46: samanantarapratiṣṭhāpitaśca bodhisattvena dakṣiṇaścaraṇayoḥ kramatalastasmin devakule atha tā acetanyo devapratimāḥ tadyathā-śivaskandanārāyaṇakuberacandrasūryavaiśravaṇaśakrabrahmalokapālaprabhṛtayaḥ pratimāḥ-sarvāḥ svebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ sthānebhyo vyutthāya bodhisattvasya kramatalayornipatanti sma|
422:54: no merū girirāja parvatavaro jātū name sarṣape
422:55: no vā sāgara nāgarājanilayo jātū name goṣpade|
422:56: candrāditya prabhaṃkarā prabhakarā khadyotake no name
422:58: yadvat sarṣapa goṣpade va salilaṃ khadyotakā vā bhavet
422:59: evaṃ ca trisahasra devamanujā ye keci mānāśritāḥ|
422:61: yaṃ loko hyabhivandya lābha labhate svargaṃ tathā nirvṛtim||5||
422:62: asmin khalu punarbhikṣavo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena devakule praveśe saṃdarśyamāne dvātriṃśatāṃ devaputraśatasahasrāṇāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpadyante|
422:63: ayaṃ bhikṣavo heturayaṃ pratyayo yenopekṣako bodhisattvo bhavati sma devakulamupanīyamāna iti||
